main event: A bright stationary light was observed near Mt. Whitney, California, appearing to illuminate the surrounding area like a photo flash before going out of sight.
interesting points: The object was described as being much brighter than stars in the night sky., The sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds., The object caused illumination in the canyon wall and campground., It was reported to resemble a meteor but significantly brighter., The sighting occurred on September 18, 1960, 8 miles NW of Pasadena.
